tool_description: An API getting all recipes from all the different online sources available.
title: Recipes from Multiple Sources

api_list.name: Get All Dinner Recipes From All Data Sources
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all dinner recipes from multiple data sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recipes-from-multiple-sources.p.rapidapi.com/dinner/recipes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipes-from-multiple-sources.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Recipes From Individual Data Sources
api_list.description: Get dinner recipes from a specific data source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recipes-from-multiple-sources.p.rapidapi.com/dinner/recipes/{sourceid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipes-from-multiple-sources.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
